content.rendered:
Skills
Front-end
Typescript, JavaScript ES6, Vue.js / Vuex, VueCLI, React / Redux, Angular, jQuery,
Zurb Foundation 6, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, Webpack, Gulp
Back-end
Java, Maven, Gradle, Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, SQL, PL/SQL,
PHP 7, Laravel
Mobile
React Native, Ionic, Apache Cordova, Mapbox, ArcGIS, Trigger.io
Databases
OracleDB, MySQL, ElasticSearch
Dev-ops
Docker, OpenStack, Bash, Apache
CMS
Oracle APEX, Magento, OXID, WordPress, Joomla
Graphics software
Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro
Operating systems
Windows 10, MacOS Mojave, Linux (mainly Ubuntu and centOS)
Familiar with software
IntelliJ IDEA, Gitlab, JIRA, TortoiseSVN, Asana, HeidiSQL, Matlab, Office, Xcode, Eclipse
Languages
Polish – native
English – fluent writing and speaking (C1)
German – intermediate (B1)
French – basic (A1) (taking part in A2 course)
Additional qualifications
Driving license category B
